text: Melba Till Allen (March 3, 1933 – October 20, 1989) was an American politician who served as the Auditor of Alabama from 1967 to 1975 and as the Treasurer of Alabama from 1975 to 1978. She died of cancer on October 20, 1989, in Montgomery, Alabama at age 56. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:1989 deaths Category:Deaths from cancer in Alabama Category:State Auditors of Alabama Category:State treasurers of Alabama Category:Alabama Democrats
title: Melba Till Allen
